titleStmt.title: A warning to all the inhabitants of the earth where this shall come, but especially to those that are called magistrates or rulers, and so pretend to bear a sword of justice for the punishment of evil-doers these are those things which hath been laid upon me from the great Jehovah as his commands to you, and they are as followeth.
titleStmt.author: Eeds, Judith.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.B. for the author,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
